tool.name: bed2bigbed
tool.description: Convert bed files to bigbed files
tool.command: /bin/bash -c "/awkCommand.sh $input1 output_norm.bed ; sort -k1,1 -k2,2n output_norm.bed > output_norm_sort.bed ; /tmp/bedToBigBed -as=/tmp/narrowPeak.as -type=bed6+4 output_norm_sort.bed #if $chrom.name == "mm10" /tmp/mm10.chrom.sizes $output1" #else if $chrom.name == "hg19" /tmp/hg19.chrom.sizes $output1" #end if
